014
015package de.softwareforge.testing.postgres.embedded;
016
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
018import static java.lang.String.format;
019
020import java.io.File;
021import java.io.FilterInputStream;
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.io.InputStream;
024import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
025import java.util.Objects;
026import java.util.function.Supplier;
027import java.util.jar.JarEntry;
028import java.util.jar.JarFile;
029
030import com.google.common.base.Suppliers;
031import org.slf4j.Logger;
032import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
033
034/**
035 * Resolves PostgreSQL archives from the Maven repository. Looks for the zonky.io artifacts located at
036 * <code>io.zonky.test.postgres:embedded-postgres-binaries-&lt;os&gt;-&lt;arch&gt;</code>.
037 * <p>
038 * See <a href="https://github.com/zonkyio/embedded-postgres-binaries">The Zonky IO github page</a> for more details.
039 */
040public final class ZonkyIOPostgresLocator implements Supplier<InputStream> {
041
042    private static final String ZONKY_GROUP_ID = "io.zonky.test.postgres";
043    private static final String ZONKY_ARTIFACT_ID_TEMPLATE = "embedded-postgres-binaries-%s-%s";
044
045    public static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ZonkyIOPostgresLocator.class);
046
047    private static final boolean PREFER_NATIVE = Boolean.getBoolean("pg-embedded.prefer-native");
048
049    private final String architecture;
050    private final String os;
051
052    private final MavenArtifactLoader artifactLoader = new MavenArtifactLoader();
053
054    private final Supplier<File> fileSupplier = Suppliers.memoize(this::loadArtifact);
055
056    ZonkyIOPostgresLocator() {
057        this.os = computeOS();
058        this.architecture = computeTarXzArchitectureName();
059        LOG.debug(format("Detected a %s %s system", architecture, os));
060    }
061
062    @Override
063    public InputStream get() {
064        File artifactFile = fileSupplier.get();
065        return createJarStream(artifactFile);
066    }
067
068    private File loadArtifact() {
069        try {
070            String artifactId = format(ZONKY_ARTIFACT_ID_TEMPLATE, this.os, computeJarArchitectureName());
071
072            // alpine hack
073            if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ALPINE_LINUX) {
074                artifactId += "-alpine";
075            }
076
077            String version = artifactLoader.findLatestVersion(ZONKY_GROUP_ID, artifactId, EmbeddedPostgres.POSTGRES_VERSION);
078            File file = artifactLoader.getArtifactFile(ZONKY_GROUP_ID, artifactId, version);
079            checkState(file != null && file.exists(), "Could not locate artifact file for %s:%s", artifactId, version);
080            return file;
081        } catch (IOException e) {
082            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
083        }
084    }
085
086    private InputStream createJarStream(File file) {
087        try {
088            JarFile jar = new JarFile(file);
089            String entryName = format("postgres-%s-%s", computeOS(), computeTarXzArchitectureName());
090
091            // alpine hack
092            if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ALPINE_LINUX) {
093                entryName += "-alpine_linux";
094            }
095
096            JarEntry jarEntry = jar.getJarEntry(entryName + ".txz");
097            checkState(jarEntry != null, "Could not locate %s in the jar file (%s)", entryName, file.getAbsoluteFile());
098
099            // When the input stream gets closed, close the jar file as well.
100            return new FilterInputStream(jar.getInputStream(jarEntry)) {
101                @Override
102                public void close() throws IOException {
103                    try {
104                        super.close();
105                    } finally {
106                        jar.close();
107                    }
108                }
109            };
110        } catch (IOException e) {
111            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
112        }
113    }
114
115    @Override
116    public String toString() {
117        return format("ZonkyIO Stream locator for PostgreSQL (arch: %s os: %s)", architecture, os);
118    }
119
120    @Override
121    public boolean equals(Object o) {
122        if (this == o) {
123            return true;
124        }
125        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) {
126            return false;
127        }
128        ZonkyIOPostgresLocator that = (ZonkyIOPostgresLocator) o;
129        return architecture.equals(that.architecture) && os.equals(that.os);
130    }
131
132    @Override
133    public int hashCode() {
134        return Objects.hash(architecture, os);
135    }
136
137    private static String computeTarXzArchitectureName() {
138        String architecture = EmbeddedUtil.OS_ARCH;
139        if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_X86_64) {
140            architecture = "x86_64";  // Zonky uses x86_64
141        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_AARCH64) {
142            if (!PREFER_NATIVE && EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_MAC) {
143                // Mac binaries are fat binaries stored as x86_64
144                architecture = "x86_64";
145            } else {
146                architecture = "arm_64";
147            }
148        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_AARCH32) {
149            architecture = "arm_32";
150        }
151        return architecture;
152    }
153
154    private static String computeJarArchitectureName() {
155        String architecture = EmbeddedUtil.OS_ARCH;
156        if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_X86_64) {
157            architecture = "amd64";  // Zonky uses amd64 for the jar name
158        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_AARCH64) {
159            if (!PREFER_NATIVE && EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_MAC) {
160                // Mac binaries are fat binaries stored as amd64
161                architecture = "amd64";
162            } else {
163                architecture = "arm64v8";
164            }
165        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_ARCH_AARCH32) {
166            architecture = "arm32v7";
167        }
168        return architecture;
169    }
170
171    private static String computeOS() {
172        String os = EmbeddedUtil.OS_NAME;
173        if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_LINUX) {
174            os = "linux";
175        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_MAC) {
176            os = "darwin";
177        } else if (EmbeddedUtil.IS_OS_WINDOWS) {
178            os = "windows";
179        }
180        return os;
181    }
182}
